ComicInfo.Summary:
The Official History of the Marvel Apes Universe, Part 4: When Simians Clash 2099: The Watcher relates the story of the 2099 Marvel Apes Universe, which he believes to be the end of that world, but there's a surprise in store.
Book 4: 100 Monkeys!: Baron Blood plans to invade Marty and Fiona's Earth with his vampire apes, but Speedball leads the uncontrolled heroes against them and wins. Marty and Fiona finally can go home (and the ape Speedball tags along).
